__comment01__: SPECIFY WHAT MODULES WILL BE INCLUDED IN TELEGRAM BOT

modules.__comment04__: Default (initial) module for handling user messages (see RequestResponseContainer.py)

chatgpt.__comment01__: SPECIFY revChatGPT API TYPE (currently available only 1 or 3)
chatgpt.__comment05__: MODEL NAME FOR API TYPE 3 (default: gpt-3.5-turbo)
chatgpt.__comment06__: FOR API TYPE 1 ACCESS TOKEN IS RECOMMENDED. GET IT FROM https://chat.openai.com/api/auth/session
chatgpt.__comment07__: OR SESSION_TOKEN (FROM COOKIES ON chat.openai.com AS __Secure-next-auth.session-token
chatgpt.__comment08__: SET TO TRUE IF YOU HAVE PAID ACCOUNT
chatgpt.__comment09__: READ Base URL SECTION IN README. ONLY FOR API TYPE 1. SPECIFY NOTHING TO USE DEFAULT VALUE
chatgpt.__comment10__: MUST BE IN FORMAT http://IP:PORT/api/ (ex. http://192.168.0.2:9090/api/)
chatgpt.__comment11__: ENDING SLASH AND http:// (https://) IS MANDATORY!
chatgpt.__comment12__: WHAT MESSAGE DOES THE Continue BUTTON SEND
chatgpt.__comment13__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
chatgpt.__comment14__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
chatgpt.__comment15__: MINIMUM INTERVAL (IN SECONDS) BETWEEN EACH CHATGPT REQUEST
chatgpt.__comment17__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

edgegpt.__comment02__: Go to bing.com/chat and ask Bing about something
edgegpt.__comment04__: Click Export on the bottom right, then Export as JSON (This saves your cookies to clipboard)
edgegpt.__comment05__: Create new .json file and paste cookies into it, save file and specify path to it here
edgegpt.__comment06__: WSS LINK FOR EDGE-GPT (LEAVE EMPTY FOR THE DEFAULT VALUE)
edgegpt.__comment07__: DEFAULT CONVERSATION STYLE (0 - PRECISE, 1 - BALANCED, 3 - CREATIVE)
edgegpt.__comment08__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
edgegpt.__comment09__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
edgegpt.__comment11__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

dalle.__comment01__: FOR REQUESTS TO DALL-E PROVIDE YOUR API_KEY FROM https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
dalle.__comment02__: SPECIFY FORMAT OF GENERATED IMAGES (256x256 or 512x512 or 1024x1024)
dalle.__comment03__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
dalle.__comment04__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
dalle.__comment06__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

bing_imagegen.__comment02__: Go to bing.com/chat and ask Bing about something
bing_imagegen.__comment04__: Click Export on the bottom right, then Export as JSON (This saves your cookies to clipboard)
bing_imagegen.__comment05__: Create new .json file and paste cookies into it, save file and specify path to it here
bing_imagegen.__comment06__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
bing_imagegen.__comment07__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
bing_imagegen.__comment09__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

bard.__comment02__: Go to https://bard.google.com/ and ask Bard about something
bard.__comment04__: Click Export on the bottom right, then Export as JSON (This saves your cookies to clipboard)
bard.__comment05__: Create new .json file and paste cookies into it, save file and specify path to it here
bard.__comment06__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
bard.__comment07__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
bard.__comment09__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

gemini.__comment03__: MINIMUM INTERVAL (IN SECONDS) BETWEEN EACH GEMINI REQUEST
gemini.__comment04__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
gemini.__comment05__: OR SET TO auto AND ENABLE proxy_automation TO AUTOMATICALLY SEARCH WORKING PROXIES
gemini.__comment07__: HOW OFTEN EACH USER CAN SEND REQUESTS TO THIS MODULE (SPECIFY 0 TO REMOVE THE RESTRICTION)

telegram.__comment01__: PROVIDE YOUR BOT API KEY FROM https://t.me/BotFather
telegram.__comment02__: SPECIFY THE chat_id OF THOSE WHO CAN USE ADMINISTRATOR COMMANDS
telegram.__comment03__: SET TO TRUE TO BLOCK NEW USERS BY DEFAULT (WHITELIST)
telegram.__comment04__: SPECIFY THE SIZE OF THE REQUEST QUEUE AND WHETHER TO SHOW A MESSAGE ABOUT ADDING TO THE QUEUE
telegram.__comment05__: IN HOW MANY SECONDS TO EDIT MESSAGES (FOR ChatGPT / EdgeGPT)
telegram.__comment06__: ADD CURSOR CHARACTER TO END OF MESSAGE DURING RESPONSE
telegram.__comment07__: IF RESPONSE IS LARGER THAN THIS NUMBER (IN CHARS), IT WILL BE SPLIT INTO MULTIPLE MESSAGES
telegram.__comment08__: IF CAPTION IS LARGER THAN THIS NUMBER (IN CHARS), IT WILL BE SPLIT INTO MULTIPLE MESSAGES
telegram.__comment09__: SET TO true FOR THE BOT TO REPLY TO PLAIN MESSAGES AS WELL AS DIRECT MODULE COMMANDS
telegram.__comment10__: HOW MANY SECONDS TO WAIT BETWEEN EACH MESSAGE WHEN BROADCASTING
telegram.__comment11__: BOT COMMANDS DESCRIPTION (WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY ADDED TO THE BOT)

__comment10__: SETTINGS TO SAVE REQUESTS AND RESPONSE TO FILES

data_collecting.__comment01__: SET true TO AUTOMATICALLY SAVE USER REQUESTS AND RESPONSES TO FILES INTO data_collecting_dir
data_collecting.__comment02__: NOTE: YOU SHOULD NOTIFY USERS IF IT IS ENABLED!
data_collecting.__comment03__: MAXIMUM FILE SIZE (IN BYTES). IF THE SIZE WILL EXCEED THIS VALUE, A NEW FILE WILL BE CREATED
data_collecting.__comment04__: NAME OF THE FILE TO BE CREATED
data_collecting.__comment05__: REQUEST LOG FORMAT. {0} - TIMESTAMP, {1} - CONTAINER ID, {2} - USER NAME, {3} - USER ID, {4} - MODULE NAME, {5} - REQUEST
data_collecting.__comment06__: RESPONSE LOG FORMAT. {0} - TIMESTAMP, {1} - CONTAINER ID, {2} - USER NAME, {3} - USER ID, {4} - MODULE NAME, {5} - RESPONSE

proxy_automation.__comment01__: SET TO true TO ENABLE AUTOMATIC PROXY SEARCH. SET proxy TO auto IN MODULE TO USE THIS PROXY
proxy_automation.__comment03__: SET TO true TO ENABLE COUNTRY FILTER
proxy_automation.__comment04__: URL TO WHICH THE GET REQUEST WILL BE SENT TO CHECK THE CONNECTION
proxy_automation.__comment05__: AFTER HOW LONG (SECONDS) TO CHECK WHETHER THE CURRENT PROXY IS WORKING
proxy_automation.__comment06__: HOW LONG (SECONDS) TO WAIT A REPLY
